TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable PeerNearMe extends System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer implements class System.IEquatable`1<class System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class PeerNearMe Inherits Peer Implements IEquatable(Of PeerNearMe), ISerializable
type PeerNearMe = class inherit Peer interface IEquatable<PeerNearMe> interface ISerializable

summary.span: 代表「近端分享」基礎結構所定位的對等電腦。

span.span: Represents a peer located by the "People Near Me" infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法直接建立此類別的執行個體。An instance of this class cannot be created directly. 相反地，「 附近 」 呼叫的對等的對等的參考使用取得的靜態方法來傳回附近的對等電腦的集合。Instead, a reference to the peers "near" the calling peer is obtained by using the static method to return a collection of nearby peers. 所表示的對等物件不是一定的呼叫對等的通訊錄中。A peer represented by a object is not necessarily in the calling peer's address book.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 擷取的資料儲存在快取中存取並方法，以及屬性。The data retrieved is stored in a cache accessed by the and methods as well as the property. 如果呼叫端未訂閱要使用的方法只需要指定， ，或。The method only needs to be used if the caller is not subscribed to the specified , , or . 這個方法會封鎖其他的呼叫，直到網路作業完成，且在更新的快取。This method blocks additional calls until the network operation is complete and the cache has been updated. 呼叫端不需要登入方法或透過使用者介面中成功完成此作業。The caller is not required to sign in with the method or via a user interface in to complete this operation successfully.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void OnRefreshDataCompleted(class System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.RefreshDataCompletedEventArgs e) cil managed

param.name: e
param.span: 執行個體內含的事件資料。

span.span: Event data contained in a instance.

summary.span: 以信號通知 事件。

span.span: Signals the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繼承自這個類別的類別可以覆寫此方法，以執行其他工作時就會發生事件。Classes that inherit from this class can override this method to perform additional tasks when the event occurs. 這個方法也可讓衍生的類別，而不需要附加委派處理事件。This method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在衍生類別中，務必呼叫基底類別的實作，這個方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。

span.span: In a derived class, be sure to call the base class' implementation of this method so that registered delegates receive the event.
